marytts.features
Class MaryLanguageFeatureProcessors

java.lang.Object
  marytts.features.MaryGenericFeatureProcessors
      marytts.features.MaryLanguageFeatureProcessors

public class MaryLanguageFeatureProcessors
extends MaryGenericFeatureProcessors

Provides the set of feature processors that are used by this language as part of the CART processing.
